```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(here)
```


```{r}
MacD <- read_excel("data/MacD.xlsx")

df <- MacD[,-c(2,3,13)]

df <- df %>%
  gather(key = macronut, value = value, -name)
```

```{r}

df[df[,1] == "Double Cheeseburger avec pain sans gluten",] %>% 
  ggplot(aes(macronut, value)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "blue") + 
    theme_bw()


presentation <- MacD[,-c(2,3)]

nom <- MacD[1,1]

presentation[presentation[,1] == "Big Mac",] %>%
  kable(booktabs = T, col.names = c("Nom","Poid", "Kcal", "Protéines", "Glucides", "Sugar", "Lipides", "Acides Gras Saturés", "Fibres", "Sel", "Allergies")) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), full_width = T)

```
